p.e:
THE DARK SIDE OF ANYLAND.

MANY ANYLANDERS UNFORTUNATELY
ARE KNOWN TO HAVE DANGEROUS DRUG
ADDICTIONS. TROLLS SOMETIMES INDULGE
HELPLESS ADDICTS IN THEIR SELF-DESTRUCTIVE
TENDENCIES. TRY A SAMPLE OF THE "RAVE-HAZE",
BUT BE WARNED - MANY A GREAT ANYLANDER HAVE
HAD THEIR LIVES DESTROYED BECAUSE OF THIS
TRRRIBLE SUBSTANCE.
